name: National Girls
description:
National Girls is a slide-puzzle game with cute anime girls. You have to move parts of the picture around to complete the picture and support your country.

It is a sliding puzzle that consists of a frame of square tiles in random order with one tile missing. The puzzle also exists in other sizes - 2x3, 3x2, 3x3, 4x3. The object of the puzzle is to place the tiles in order by making sliding moves that use the empty space.

National Girls :
  • is a patriotic cosy game
  • has five different girls
  • has intuitive interface
